1.0.name: wordpress/woocommerce-extra-price-fields
1.0.description:
Woocommerce Extra Price Fields is Plugin for adding extra price description to show in front end.This is very usefull for the users in countries/regions where it is required to show product price per 100gm or per 100 piece along with the product solo price.

Features:

  • Supports latest woocommerce
  • Automatically shows price in front end , no setting required
  • Please send me your feedback here for any new features you want to see in next version of this plugin.I will be glad to receive feedback.
